title: Cowpens National Battlefield: Support Your Park
body: Support Your Park       Getting involved with the National Park Service can be as simple as picking up a single piece of trash during your visit to a park, or as involved as pursuing a career with the federal government. Friends groups, associations, volunteers and everyday park visitors all have the potential to contribute in some way to the protection of our national treasures.  For more information, call 864-461-2828.
